Author: surexchain
Title: [ANN][DARF]Chain: ERP + tokens exchange on blockchain
Body: We actively develop the project and now prepare the round of investments to build the foundation for scrum-investing to tokenized projects. We aim to turn the token market from speculative trading to long-term investing with transparent work of funded projects and giving investors the residual (passive) income instead of unstable trading. This requires not only software development but involving of lawers too. We work on the scheme for the light start of SEC compliance for projects.  Thank you for your support!

Title: [ANN][DARF]Chain: ERP + tokens exchange on blockchain
Body: Maya Zotova-Hess - a Partner in the Crypto Fund "Dragon Swiss" - has offered to the team to discuss the point about preparation the presentation pack for the Swiss investors. The main idea of the issue was to create a short and completely full presentation material for a Swiss investors group consideration. DARF team has accepted the Maya's suggestion. We have a few work meetings last week. During the events we have filled the short product description, financial plans, the product positioning also and asked every Maya's question about the platform.

Author: surexchain
Title: [ANN][DARF]Chain: ERP + tokens exchange on blockchain
Body: We successfully developed DARFChain - Distributed Accounting/Administering Resource with Fidelity on blockchain! And we have new ideas! Currently, we are developing the software and methodology that can dramatically change the Impact Investing. We call it 'antiventure' or 'post-investing'. It can provide a full avoid of in-project risks for investors. It is a combination of the Agile Kanban development process with the release funding mechanism based on the actual deliverables/completed user stories. The proposal looks on the high level as the following steps:  0. Investors transfer tokens to your escrow fund; 1. The project team issues their ERC20 token on the Ethereum platform (or same): 2. The team starts their implementation project using the Agile software development methodology in our DARFChain system. On a monthly basis the development conducts every step there from finance accounting to Kanban cards movement and leads movement in the sales funnel. 3. After the month finished investors look project's traction and if team shows good performance, all goals achieved, investors approve to buy one-month proportion of the offered tokens and team continues to work on the next portion of user stories.  We prepare this nice scheme to explain method of antiventure post investing!

Author: surexchain
Title: [ANN][DARF]Chain: ERP + tokens exchange on blockchain
Body: Risk-free DARFchain investing platform based on DAICO  New investment solutions based on DAICO We continue working  on the environment for safe investment. We already made the first implementation of the DAICO by Vitalik's Buterin concept through the integration of the ERP system, IPFS and Ethereum. https://darfchain.com/news/2018/mar/22/risk-free-darfchain-investing-platform-based-daico  As one of the results of this work will be the creation of an escrow fund. Investors can put the money in it and take them back if the task set by the investor is not executed or accepted for execution by the team of the ICO project. The bulk of the fees will go to the endowment of this fund.     Risk-free ICO investing platform Now we develop a risk-free ICO investing platform. This approach provides investor not only with safe way of investing but direct influence to the ICO-projects development and growth.      The ICO team has issued tokens and started work on the project.     Investor writes (in Odoo for instance) his own  user story or offer with desired business-functions.     Investor remits the sum in our DARF tokens to the escrow smart-contract. DARFs he had to bougth before.     System commits the money, investor does not get the tokens for a while.     Other investors can see the offer, accept it and join to the the escrow.     The project team starts to negotiate the investors offers and assign the story  terms and conditions - the job objective, scoup and criteria of acceptance. The progress of negotiations is fixed in the trusted distributed storage system DARFChain.     In case of team reject the user story or doesn’t accept or consider it during the time limit, investors get their money back.     If investor and team have got a deal and team has accepted user story, then money can not back to the investor but the team will not get them, untill job is accepted by investor’s side.     If team count that the job has been fulfilled, they request the smart-contract close, and investors can get this message at their wallets.     If majority of  investors (according to the sum) is agree that  work is done, then smart-contract remit sum to the team and tokens - to investors. Then team can exchange DARFs to Ether via smart-contract with fixed price. Platform advantages  Investors can directly influence the progress of the project, They risk only small amount of money, The team gets new ideas product development, Investors can monitor project's traction online. If you wants to join this round of ICO, which starts on April 30 and lasts 42 days, sign up for the whitelist https://darfchain.com/news/2018/mar/22/risk-free-darfchain-investing-platform-based-daico#whitelist.

Author: surexchain
Title: [ANN][DARF]Chain: ERP + tokens exchange on blockchain
Body: When ERP Meets Blockchain   We are at the start of a new enterprise resource planning (ERP) digital transformation with the introduction of blockchain technology, best known as a digital ledger (think distributed database) behind cryptocurrency. However, businesses are adopting blockchain as a trusted system through which to share records with partners. That’s where you’ll see blockchain enter the enterprise.  http://it.toolbox.com/blogs/inside-erp/when-erp-meets-blockchain-78538

Author: surexchain
Title: [ANN][DARF]Chain: ERP + tokens exchange on blockchain
Body: 10 rules of ICO startuper and some apocryphal history of DARFChain.   BitcoinX: When and why did you first decide to do an ICO?  DARFCHAIN: We kicked off in an old fashion way, running circles around venture capitalists, business angels and small private equity investors. And it was when our committed potential investors broke the deal during the 15th round of negotiations, complaining that he doesn’t feel like understanding some minor details and can’t start the project. That’s when I learned the first rule of new era start-upper: never waste your time finding an investor, write your white paper instead. Thus, Our ICO is a predefined one.  BitcoinX: Tell us about what preparation was required to get the project to this point?  DARFCHAIN: Here are some general rules for an ICO startup, aside from the one I already mentioned: Rule #2. Have a detailed and clear vision of the project – this is no different from a usual business plan.  Rule #3. Write white paper in a clear manner, making it understandable for everybody. Rule #4. Publish white paper on Bitcointalk.org and open your helmet, cause the hater trolls will be biting you. Rule #5. Be prepared for everything, from tons of hate and criticizing to discovering an extra of 10 BTC in the morning in your crypto wallet – haters are way more probable and outnumber donors, obviously, so stick to believing in yourself and don’t lose faith in your project. Rule #6. Be ready to repeat this step N cycles, where N can be rather big. Rule #7. Create a landing page Rule #8. Start bounty programme and love your bountiers at all time, they are your first investors. Rule #9. Start pre-sale of tokens and advertise it everywhere. Rule #10. As early as possible start developing your product and demonstrate it to online community. We started the project in May 2017 and have been fully on track of its development ever since. These days we are delivering the market the news on implementation of the Ethereum blockchain based ERP system, and expect the next milestone to be achieved in early November – we’ll rollout alfa-version of crowd audit system. ... http://www.bitcoinx.com/3891-2/

Author: surexchain
Title: [ANN][DARF]Chain: ERP + tokens exchange on blockchain
Body: Forbes has published article based on our report  What motivates the creation of a ‘Sci-Fi’ ICO, as opposed to a scam or a fraud, is that there is “no intention to defraud its investors”, it is just that the actual goal of the ICO is rather hard to achieve realistically. That is the view contained in a report from DARFChain, an ERP system built on blockchain technology currently in the pre-ICO stage.  A good example would be the Peter Thiel-backed, SeaSteading Institute - if they would ever go to an ICO model. The project has solid, world recognized names backing it up. However, the idea of the project that is creating whole new countries in free areas of the ocean - is clearly very difficult to achieve, albeit not entirely impossible.  DARFChain’s report comes as Chinese regulators - including the China Securities Regulatory Commission and the China Banking Regulatory Commission - were to crack down on ICOs, according to Beijing-based media group Caixin.  https://www.forbes.com/sites/rogeraitken/2017/09/05/sci-fi-crypto-icos-versus-real-business-icos-breaking-down-the-hype/#8ff9703239f7

Author: surexchain
Title: [ANN][DARF]Chain: ERP + tokens exchange on blockchain
Body: Dear partners!  Thanks to all who agreed to participate in the bounty as  translators! We ask you not to hurry with the beginning of the transfer, because a new version of the whitepaper will be released next week. We will let you know when it will be necessary to start work!  Languages and countries have not yet been dismantled: Chinese, Korean, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Arabic. It will also be great if a native Englishman takes someone to read the whitepaper in English.  Active and qualitative translators will first of all be offered the status of the Ambassador in their country and the opportunity to constantly receive a share of the profits from the work of the DARFChain system in the country!

Author: surexchain
Title: [ANN][DARF]Chain: ERP + tokens exchange on blockchain
Body: Dear @jacaf01, thank you for a deep question!  We do not build "the another one" coin exchange, but we integrate the purchase and sale of diffrent tokens directly into the ERP system, which allows the user to combine the accounting of his transactions in one place both in the oldstyle fiat and any of new era digital currencies.

Author: surexchain
Title: [ANN][DARF]Chain: ERP + tokens exchange on blockchain
Body: DARFChain Distributed Accounting  Resource and Finance system in blockChain  http://darfchain.com/en/  We develop distributed ERP system,  that uses blockchain as  trusted, unmutable database. DARFChain consists of: an ERP server, that provides analytical manageral accounting of the fiat and crypto-currencies, the exchange of tokens, the partner mobile application - the wallet  that allows receiving payments via SMS, maintain primary accounting and data exchange infrastructure in which the existing Public blockchains or their analogues, constructor of semantical smart contracts and robots that trade tokens on external exchanges.   “Dar” means "gift" in Russian “Darf” means  "may & should"  in German   As an epigraph - a metaphor, anecdote.    The idea of the project is to involve small entrepreneurs in digital currencies (up to 120 million people in the world), cooperative members (about 250 million people to the world), just communities, including online gaming (up to 50 million people in the world), children Communities - by creating an instrument for them to solve the problems of financing the activities of all these communities. The developed system creates new opportunities for running such a business, namely fully distributed and trusted accounting + rapid creation of investment financial instruments.   Entrepreneurs, cooperatives will be able to do business practically without attracting bank loans, cash (can issue their own), without the use of smart cards, POS terminals - having only a computer, a smartphone and mobile phones available to customers. Online clans will be able to account for loot and calculate their tokens for the services of tanks for future victories. Children will be able to come up with their "children's" tokens: money, stocks, run teenage businesses, and trade them on the stock exchange. Also, the implementation of the semantic constructor of smart contracts on the basis of accounting objects in the format RDF schema.org will make it possible to take another step towards "non-legal" business.  DARFChain Architecture:    WHITE PAPER:https://docs.google.com/document/d/1XU50mN0hHecy32qLKCaaTGiTlA6HOG_-ZRJdS4WrBN8/edit#  WEB: http://darfchain.com/en/    BOUNTY http://bounty.darfchain.com/en/bounty_cond  GIT:https://github.com/DARFChainTeam
